channel.title: Darkchocolate on Mario'z Eats
channel.description: Recent content in Darkchocolate on Mario'z Eats

item.title: Dragonfruit Dark Chocolate Lava Cake and Dragonfruit Sorbet
item.description:
I had been looking for a red dragonfruit for the longest time and finally found one! The last time I made something with dragonfruit I realized it probably would have tasted better as a sorbet and drizzle on a lava cake. Ended up doing that + making it the filling!

This recipe is for about 4ish servings. [usually 3 chocolate + inside flavor and 1 just inside flavor].

item.title: Guava Dark Chocolate Lava Cake
item.description:
Lava cakes are a simple and delicious dessert that don’t take much time to make and bake. Changing up the filling is super easy as well! This recipe is for about 4ish servings. [usually 3 chocolate + inside flavor and 1 just inside flavor]. 

NOTE 1: This is my first time using a fruit puree in the lava cake base, so it made it a bit runny. However, chilling it in the fridge for a few minutes before piping it into the ramekin helped.
